snippet: The green energy car subsidiary of Chinese automaker Beijing Automotive Group [BEJINS.UL] plans an initial public offering in 2018, Chairman Xu Heyi said on Monday, adding that the unit should be profitable that year....

headline.main: Germany's Turkish Community Say Erdogan Went Too Far With Nazi Comments
headline.print_headline: Germany's Turkish Community Say Erdogan Went Too Far With Nazi Comments

lead_paragraph: The green energy car subsidiary of Chinese automaker Beijing Automotive Group [BEJINS.UL] plans an initial public offering in 2018, Chairman Xu Heyi said on Monday, adding that the unit should be profitable that year.
